Ok, everybody who's desperate about a crack... Here's how to crack it by yourself.
(note: all the files I'm referring to are supposed to live in the application directory, usually C:\Program Files\Farming-Simulator 2009\" or so)

step 1: get a decent hex editor. XVI32 is my tool of choice for Windows.

step 2: patch FarmingSimulator.exe. Change bytes starting at offset 3d5e from "0f8491" to "e08e00".

step 2b: if you want, test it. You should not get the "enter your serial" screen anymore, but instead an error saying something like "contact customer support with error number soandso".

step 3: patch FarmingSimulator2009.exe. change the byte at offset 8bf29 from "75" to "eb".

Note: this definitely works with the version that I downloaded from exactly this torrent.

If you're too dumb to follow the instructions, well... try again to understand them. If you still don't get anything, read up some background information about the words you didn't understand. Wikipedia is a good start. And if you're still hopelessly lost, wait for someone else to post a "ready-for-dummies" crack.
ouch. "e08e00" definitely is "e98e00". sorry for the typo.
.. and step 3 should read "patch game.exe". Proofreading: failed, I know. ;-)

> do you lauch the game from farminsimulator.exe or game.exe.

It doesn't matter. farmingsimulator.exe is just a tiny wrapper that in the end calls "game.exe -script dataS/scripts/main.lua -name FarmingSimulator2009".

if you want to run game.exe directly, you don't even need to patch farmingsimulator.exe, because you'd never even execute it.

but since it's easier to start using farmingsimulator.exe, and this file also includes the registration check, it also needs to be cracked.

that said, i personally start using farmingsimulator.exe, simply because it's easier.

> Anyway, thanks for your help 

you're welcome :-)
